titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for long-term capital gain on property acquired or disposed of during 2009 or 2010.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for long-term capital gain on property acquired or disposed of during 2009 or 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income long-term gain on capital assets acquired or disposed of between January 1, 2009, and December 31, 2010.
